message: I propose we split the money 4:1 in favor of Bob to encourage fairness. Remember, inflation will reduce the value of money in subsequent rounds.
Let's be realistic, I'm taking almost everything.  Inflation is a factor, but I'm confident I can get a better deal in the next round if you reject this.
I propose an equal division of the remaining funds. This maintains fairness while acknowledging the impact of inflation on our decisions.
